strapiEvent.name: Hogeye Marathon Half Marathon and 4-Person Relay
strapiEvent.description: The State's oldest continuously-running marathon & half marathon, now in the 48th year. The event, which also includes a marathon team relay, a 10K and 5K (4/21/24) will start and finish in Downtown Springdale. Get your company team, together to participate in the Team Challenge- even non-runners are able to be on the team as volunteers for the event. It is TIME to Get Your Pig On at The Hogeye. For More information go to https://hogeyemarathon.com/
